mapper.update: update teaching_class_t set ELC_NUMBER_ = ELC_NUMBER_ + 1 where id_ = #{teachingClassId} and NUMBER_ > ELC_NUMBER_
update teaching_class_t set ELC_NUMBER_ = ELC_NUMBER_ + 1 where id_ = #{teachingClassId}
update teaching_class_t set ELC_NUMBER_ = ELC_NUMBER_ - 1 where id_ = #{teachingClassId} and ELC_NUMBER_ > 0
update teaching_class_t set THIRD_WITHDRAW_NUMBER = THIRD_WITHDRAW_NUMBER + 1 where id_ = #{teachingClassId}

update teaching_class_t set ELC_NUMBER_ = ELC_NUMBER_ + 1 where id_ in
#{item}
mapper.select: select * from teaching_class_t where id_ = #{teachingClassId} and ELC_NUMBER_ > NUMBER_

select * from teaching_class_t where ID_ in
#{id}
select GRADE_ as grade,PROFESSION_ as profession,NUMBER_ as number from teaching_class_suggest_profession_t where TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ = #{teachingClassId}
select STUDENT_ID_ from teaching_class_suggest_student_t where TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ = #{teachingClassId}

SELECT cour.id_ as courseId, cour.code_ as courseCode, open.COURSE_NAME_ as courseName from course_t cour join course_open_t open ON open.COURSE_CODE_ = cour.code_ join teaching_task_t task ON task.COURSE_OPEN_ID_ = open.id_ join teaching_class_t class ON task.id_ = class.TASK_ID_ where( select TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ from teaching_class_suggest_student_t where STUDENT_ID_ = #{stu.studentId} UNION select TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ from teaching_class_suggest_profession_t where GRADE_ = #{stu.grade} and PROFESSION_ = #{stu.major} ) GROUP BY cour.id_, cour.code_, open.COURSE_NAME_

select TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ teachingClassId, TEACHER_NAME_ teacherName from teaching_class_teacher_t where TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ in
#{id}
select TEACHER_NAME_ from teaching_class_teacher_t where TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ = #{teachingClassId}

SELECT t2.ID_ teachClassId, t3.ID_ arrangeTimeId, t3.TIME_START_ timeStart, t3.TIME_END_ timeEnd, t3.DAY_OF_WEEK_ dayOfWeek, t4.WEEK_NUMBER_ weekNumber, t4.ROOM_ID_ roomId, t4.TEACHER_CODE_ teacherCode FROM teaching_class_t t2 JOIN teaching_class_arrange_time_t t3 ON t2.ID_ = t3.TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ JOIN teaching_class_arrange_room_t t4 ON t4.ARRANGE_TIME_ID_ = t3.ID_ WHERE t2.ID_ in
#{id}

update.foreach: update teaching_class_t set ELC_NUMBER_ = ELC_NUMBER_ - #{item.withdrawNum} where id_ = #{item.id} and ELC_NUMBER_ > 0
update teaching_class_t set THIRD_WITHDRAW_NUMBER = 0 where id_ = #{item.id}
update teaching_class_t set THIRD_WITHDRAW_NUMBER = THIRD_WITHDRAW_NUMBER + #{item.withdrawNum} where id_ = #{item.id}
update teaching_class_t set RESERVE_NUMBER_ = #{item.reserveNumber} ,RESERVE_NUMBER_RATE_ = #{item.reserveNumberRate} where ID_ = #{item.id}

mapper.select:
select t1.ID_ teachingClassId,t1.CODE_ classCode,co.FACULTY_ faculty from teaching_class_t t1 join teaching_task_t t2 on t2.ID_=t1.TASK_ID_ left join course_open_t co on co.ID_ = t2.COURSE_OPEN_ID_ where t1.ID_ in
#{item}
select co.TRAINING_LEVEL_ from course_open_t co join teaching_task_t ts on ts.COURSE_OPEN_ID_ = co.ID_ join teaching_class_t tc on tc.TASK_ID_ = ts.ID_ where tc.ID_ = #{teachingClassId}

SELECT male.MALE_NUMBER NUMBER_MALE_,female.FEMALE_NUMBER NUMBER_FEMALE_ from ( select Count(STUDENT_ID_) MALE_NUMBER,t1.TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ from `elc_course_takes_t_0` t1 left join student_t t2 on t1.STUDENT_ID_ = t2.`STUDENT_CODE_` where t1.TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ = #{teachingClassId} and t2.`SEX_` = 1) male left join ( SELECT COUNT(STUDENT_ID_) FEMALE_NUMBER,t1.TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ FROM `elc_course_takes_t_0` t1 LEFT JOIN student_t t2 ON t1.STUDENT_ID_ = t2.`STUDENT_CODE_` WHERE t1.TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ = #{teachingClassId} AND t2.`SEX_` = 2)female on male.TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ = female.TEACHING_CLASS_ID_
